member.name: T:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion
member.summary: The representation of a version, with the format: major.minor.patch-releaseLabel+buildLabel

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.Version
member.summary: Gets the major, minor and patch components as a System.Version instance

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.Major
member.summary: Gets the major component of the version

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.Minor
member.summary: Gets the minor component of the version

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.Patch
member.summary: Gets the patch component of the version

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.IsPrerelease
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is a pre-release version.
member.value: true if is prerelease; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a version from a string

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion.TryParse(System.String,MonoDevelop.Projects.MSBuild.SdkVersion@)
member.summary: Tries to parse a version from a string
member.returns: true, if version could be parsed, false otherwise.
